trans-unit.note: Button which is used to open the reply box.
Button to collapse the quote message (used in the flatten threads feature).
Button to expand the quote message (used in the flatten threads feature).
Label for the switch which lets users enable/disable the nested view in a thread.

trans-unit.source: The TW Power Tools extension has been installed. Please reload this page so that it is activated.
trans-unit.target: TW Power Tools 확장 프로그램이 설치되었습니다. 활성화하려면 이 페이지를 새로고침하세요.
trans-unit.note: Message shown as a banner when the extension has been installed, to let the user know that they should reload the page.

trans-unit.source: The TW Power Tools extension has been updated. Please reload this page so that it continues to work properly.
trans-unit.target: TW Power Tools 확장 프로그램이 업데이트되었습니다. 업데이트를 적용하려면 이 페이지를 새로고침하세요.
trans-unit.note: Message shown as a banner when the extension has been updated, to let the user know that they should reload the page.
Button which reloads the current page.
Option shown in the settings menu of the thread toolbar which enables the "bulk report replies" feature.
Text shown below the "bulk report replies" toggle, to let the user know that they can use this keyboard shortcut to toggle it.
Text shown to Mac users below the "bulk report replies" toggle, to let them know that they can use this keyboard shortcut to toggle it.
Chip label shown when sending the report.
Chip label shown when sending the report.
Chip label shown when the report succeeded.
Chip label shown when the report succeeded.
Chip shown to report a reply in a thread.
Chip shown to report a reply in a thread.
Status of a thread which has been attempted to move, but failed.
Status of a thread which has been moved successfully.
Status of a thread which is in the process of being moved.
Status of a thread which is waiting to be moved.
Text of the button in the bulk move threads dialog to close and reset the modal.
Text of the button in the bulk move threads dialog which closes the dialog.
Text of the button in the bulk move threads dialog which will perform the action.
Title of the bulk move threads dialogs.
Default option which lets the user not select any option in a thread detail select, inside the additional details picker.
Label for the forum select in the forum picker.
Label for the language select in the forum picker.
Label for the thread category select in the additional details picker.
Title of the section in the forum destination picker which contains the destination forum and language selects.
Title of the section in the forum destination picker with the category/details selects.

trans-unit.source: The old thread page design is partially broken, but this feature is kept since some PEs rely on it to access some features that are missing in the new design.
trans-unit.target: 구 버전 게시글 페이지 디자인은 부분적으로 손상되었지만, 신 버전 디자인에서 사라진 일부 기능을 필요로 하는 PE분들을 위해 유지되고 있습니다.
trans-unit.note: Additional information shown in the options page about the "Change thread page design" feature.

trans-unit.source:
One or more features have been disabled remotely for everyone.
Learn why in our discussion group.
trans-unit.target: 한 개 이상의 기능이 모든 사용자에 대해 원격으로 사용 중지되었습니다. 토론 그룹에서 더 자세한 내용을 확인해 주세요.
trans-unit.note: Content of the banner which lets users know that a feature was remotely disabled in the options page.

trans-unit.source: Shows avatars of participants next to each thread.
trans-unit.target: 각 게시글 옆에 참여자들의 아바타를 표시합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Avatars" feature.

trans-unit.source: Blocks saving drafts of your replies as you type to Google servers in the Community Console.
trans-unit.target: 커뮤니티 콘솔에서 댓글을 작성하는 동안 해당 내용이 Google 서버에 자동으로 임시 저장되는 것을 차단합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Block saving drafts" feature.

trans-unit.source: Adds a button to lock all selected threads at once.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 모든 게시글을 한 번에 잠그는 버튼을 추가합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Bulk lock" feature.

trans-unit.source: Adds a button to move all selected threads at once.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 모든 게시글을 한 번에 이동시키는 버튼을 추가합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Bulk move" feature.

trans-unit.source: Forces showing the new or old thread page design.
trans-unit.target: 신 버전 또는 구 버전 게시글 페이지 디자인을 강제로 표시합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Change thread page design" feature.

trans-unit.source: Reduce the whitespace in the UI.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Compact mode" feature.

trans-unit.source: Enables choosing between a custom-built dark theme and the vanilla light theme in the Community Console.
trans-unit.target: 커뮤니티 콘솔에서 자체 제작 다크 모드와 기본 라이트 모드를 선택할 수 있습니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Dark theme" feature.

trans-unit.source: Allows to drag and drop links to the text editor while preserving the link text.
trans-unit.target: 링크 텍스트를 유지한 채로 텍스트 편집기에 링크를 드래그 앤 드롭할 수 있습니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Fix drag and dropping links" feature.

trans-unit.source: Shows a toggle which lets you disable nested view to display the replies flattened.
trans-unit.target: 대화형식으로 보기를 비활성화하여 댓글을 목록 형태로 볼 수 있는 토글 버튼을 표시합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Flatten replies" feature.

trans-unit.source: Hides the sidebar when opening the Community Console.
trans-unit.target: 커뮤니티 콘솔을 열 때 사이드바를 숨깁니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Hide sidebar by default" feature.

trans-unit.source: Shows more prominently the dot that appears in the Community Console when Googlers publish a new announcement.
trans-unit.target: 커뮤니티 콘솔에서 구글 직원이 새 공지를 게시할 때 나타나는 점을 더 눈에 띄게 표시합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Highlight announcements notification dot" feature.

trans-unit.source: Increases contrast between the background of read and unread threads.
trans-unit.target: 읽은 게시글과 읽지 않은 게시글을 배경색으로 더 쉽게 구분할 수 있도록 대비를 강화합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Increase contrast" feature.

trans-unit.source: Automatically loads more threads when scrolling down.
trans-unit.target: 아래로 스크롤할 때 더 많은 게시글을 자동으로 불러옵니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Infinite Scroll" feature in thread lists.

trans-unit.source: Automatically loads more replies when scrolling down.
trans-unit.target: 아래로 스크롤할 때 더 많은 댓글을 자동으로 불러옵니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Infinite Scroll" feature in threads.

trans-unit.source: Prevents inline images in messages from being taller than the current window.
trans-unit.target: 메시지 내 인라인 이미지의 높이가 현재 창보다 커지지 않도록 합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Limit image size" feature.

trans-unit.source: Enables the enableLoadingDraftMessages Community Console flag, which enables recovering an existing draft saved in the Google servers when you start a new reply.
trans-unit.target: enableLoadingDraftMessages 커뮤니티 콘솔 기능을 활성화하여, 새 댓글 작성을 시작할 때 Google 서버에 저장된 기존 임시 글을 불러올 수 있도록 합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Load draft messages when replying" feature.

trans-unit.source: Shows a non-intrusive notification when a thread list has new updates.
trans-unit.target: 게시글 목록에 새 업데이트가 있을 때, 사용자를 방해하지 않는 알림을 표시합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Notify updates" feature.

trans-unit.source: Shows a badge next to the OP's username with the number of messages posted by them.
trans-unit.target: OP의 사용자 이름 옆에 지금까지 작성한 메시지 수를 나타내는 배지를 표시합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "OP messages count" feature.

trans-unit.source: Shows a per-forum activity chart in profiles.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Per-forum activity" feature.

trans-unit.source: Places the "expand thread" button all the way to the left.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Place expand button in the left" feature.

trans-unit.source: Shows a "previous posts" link in user profiles.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Previous posts" feature.

trans-unit.source: Redirects all threads opened in Tailwind Basic to the Community Console.
trans-unit.target: 기본 Tailwind에서 열리는 모든 게시글을 커뮤니티 콘솔로 리디렉션합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Redirect to the Community Console" feature.

trans-unit.source: Adds quick report buttons to all replies, so you can report each one with a single click.
trans-unit.target: 모든 댓글에 빠른 신고 버튼을 추가하여, 한 번의 클릭만으로 신고할 수 있도록 합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Report replies quickly" feature.

trans-unit.source: Makes the toolbar not disappear when scrolling down.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤을 내려도 툴바가 사라지지 않도록 합니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Sticky bulk actions toolbar" feature.

trans-unit.source: Makes the headers of the collapsible sections in the sidebar sticky so they don't disappear when scrolling down.
trans-unit.target: 사이드바에 있는 접이식 섹션의 헤더가 스크롤을 내려도 사라지지 않도록 상단에 고정됩니다.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Sticky sidebar headers" feature.
Label for the button that closes the list of feature categories in the options page.
Label for the button that opens the list of feature categories in the options page.
Label for the checkbox that lets a user enable a specific feature in the options page (ex: 'Enable "Dark theme" feature')
Label for the link to the experiments page.
Label for the link to Weblate.
Label for the sidebar of the options page that lets the user select which category to be shown.
Name of a suboption of the "Dark theme" feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.

trans-unit.target: 링크 드래그 앤 드롭 오류 수정
trans-unit.note: Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.

trans-unit.target: 댓글을 작성할 때 임시 저장 메시지 불러오기
trans-unit.note: Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.

trans-unit.source: Place expand button in the left
trans-unit.note: Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of the suboption which lets you choose the number of months to show in the OP messages count badge.

trans-unit.source: The Community Console already has this feature built-in without the need of the extension.
trans-unit.target: 확장 프로그램이 없어도 커뮤니티 콘솔에서 이 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.
trans-unit.note: Note for the "Infinite scroll" feature for thread lists.

trans-unit.source: : will use the theme defined in the system settings. : will add a button to the Community Console that lets you switch the theme.
trans-unit.target: : 시스템 설정에서 정의된 화면 모드를 사용합니다. : 화면 모드를 변경하는 버튼이 커뮤니티 콘솔에 추가됩니다.
trans-unit.note: Note for the "Theme" feature.
Selectable option for the "Design to show" suboption of the "Change thread page design" feature.
Selectable option for the "Design to show" suboption of the "Change thread page design" feature.
Selectable option for the "Theme" suboption of the "Dark theme" feature.
Selectable option for the "Theme" suboption of the "Dark theme" feature.
Suboption for the "Change thread page design" feature.
Tag shown in the options page for features that work in Tailwind Basic.
Tag shown in the options page for features that work in the Community Console.

trans-unit.source:
This feature has been disabled remotely for everyone.
Learn why.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능은 모든 사용자에 대해 원격으로 사용 중지되었습니다. 이유를 알아보세요.
trans-unit.note: Text that appears in a feature card in the options page when the feature has been disabled remotely (i.e., the feature kill switch is active).
Title of the banner which lets users know that a feature was remotely disabled in the options page.
Text for the button that lets users skip directly to the main content in a page.
The extension name.

trans-unit.source: These features only affect the Community Console's old message composer, which is shown when creating a new thread or canned response, when pressing r inside a thread, or when creating a new reply in the old thread view. The new message composer doesn't suffer from these issues.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능들은 새 게시글이나 CR를 만들 때, 스레드 내에서 r 키를 누를 때, 또는 이전 게시글 보기에서 새 답장을 작성할 때 표시되는 커뮤니티 콘솔의 구 버전 메시지 작성기에만 영향을 미칩니다. 신 버전 메시지 작성기에서는 이러한 문제가 발생하지 않습니다.
trans-unit.note: Explanatory note for the features that relate to the old reply editor in the Community Console.
Name of a generic section of features that let users perform actions to many threads at once.
Name of a generic section of features, which includes features that minimally enhance the user interface of the forums platform.
Name of the category of extension features related to profiles.
Name of the category of extension features related to the old message composer.
Name of the category of extension features related to thread lists.
Name of the category of extension features related to threads.
Name of the category of extension features that apply to multiple areas of the forums platform.

trans-unit.source: You're testing the new options page.
Please leave feedback and report bugs in our discussion group. Thanks for testing!
trans-unit.target: 개선 사항이나 버그가 있다면 저희 토론 그룹에서 알려주세요. 테스트에 참여해 주셔서 감사합니다!

trans-unit.source: Patches the bug that incorrectly opens the link dialog multiple times when adding or editing a link.
trans-unit.note: Description of the "Fix link dialog" feature.
Name of an extension feature.
Name of the category of extension features related to the message composer.
